## CompilerProps.replaceWhenUndefined property

When true, it will replace the $<!-- -->{<!-- -->foo<!-- -->} with undefined. Default behavior will leave $<!-- -->{<!-- -->foo<!-- -->} if it does not have a value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly replaceWhenUndefined?: boolean;
```
